name: Andres Garcia
title: Software Developer
sumary: I'm a Fullstack Software Developer with experience in data science, algorithms,  and machine learning, along with  proficiency in cloud, I'm well- versed in  project management and CI/CD  lifecycles, ensuring efficient and  successful outcomes.  What sets me apart is my dedication to  effective communication and  collaboration, ensuring a nice approach  to solving complex technical challenges.

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.details: Used Technologies: ECS, DynamoDB, S3, Lambda, API Gateway, Scikit Learn, Tensorflow, FastAPI, I have constructed a chat with pdfs for the Dapps Factory team. and instruct users how to use it in their projects for Galicia Bank

work.title: Fullstack Developer
work.details: Used Technologies: Paypal API, Stripe API, MongoDB, Mongoose, NextJS, ExpressJS. For this small contractor they asked me to automatize the payments for their clients and affiliates, making it fast and easy to manage their accounts.

work.title: Backend Developer
work.details: Used Technologies: Python, Javascript, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS, GIT, Postman and so on! Most of my experience in the Apen Team was as Backend Developer. inplementing solutions for the servers and debuggin applicantions as well in testing.
